Address: 120 CORPORATE BLVD STE 100, NORFOLK, Virginia, 23502, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Headquartered in Norfolk, Virginia and incorporated in Delaware, we are a global financial and business services company with operations in the Americas, Europe, and Australia. Our primary business is the purchase, collection, and management of portfolios of nonperforming loans. The accounts we purchase are primarily the unpaid obligations of individuals owed to credit grantors, which include banks and other types of consumer, retail, and auto finance companies. We purchase portfolios of nonperforming loans at a discount in two broad categories: Core and Insolvency. Our Core operation specializes in purchasing and collecting nonperforming loans, which we purchased since either the credit grantor and/or other third-party collection agencies have been unsuccessful in collecting the full balance owed.  ...
